entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with grouping enabled doesn't reflect the change on UI when a child record is removed #22158
  • CollectionView with grouping enabled behaves abnormally after adding a new child record #22156
  • iOS : No Route to Host on LAN #22154
  • SwipeView Events - (SwipeView)sender.Open does not work #22153
  • Keyboard does not showing up on SearchHandler.Focus() #22151
  • 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.LayoutView' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument #22150
  • Android platform throws exception when loading image from HTTPS source. #22147
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #22146
  • Cannot bind Shell Items #22145
  • Flyout button is visible for a split second when navigating back to home page in Android #22144

Closed

  • MAUI publish spits out hundreds of unnecessary language folders #18862
  • Deployment or Debug removes files in FileSystem.AppDataDirectory #21445
  • Unable to launch app on iOS from both VS and VS MAC #16421
  • [iOS] Page titles do not appear until navigating when pushing a modal page at startup #20199
    Backlog
  • Border StrokeShape performance issues #18925
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView #19786
    .NET 8 SR6

PullRequests

Created

  • For XAML Hot Reload: Add public method to clear ResourceDictionary cache #22157
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add VS Code Extension to move-to-vs-feedback label #22152
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Updated

  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
